mapper.insert: insert into orders (orderUid, id, orderName, orderDate, amount, payState, payMethod, buyerName, buyerTel, buyerPostcode, buyerAddr, buyerAddr2, message) values (#{orderUid}, #{id}, #{orderName}, sysdate, #{amount}, #{payState}, #{payMethod}, #{buyerName}, #{buyerTel}, #{buyerPostcode}, #{buyerAddr}, #{buyerAddr2}, #{message})
mapper.select: update orders set impUid=#{impUid} where orderUid=#{orderUid}
mapper.update: update orders set payState=#{payState} where orderUid=#{orderUid}
